levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and attacks two additional targets. If there is an allied Melee Operator in the tile ahead, grant them the following effects: Gain <$ba.strong>Vigor</> effect of <@ba.vup>+{attack@peak_performance.atk:0%}</> ATK when HP is above <@ba.vup>{attack@peak_performance.hp_ratio:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{attack@def:0%}</>, Block <@ba.vup>+{attack@block_cnt}</> (If there are no Operators or they are not Melee, grant the effect to self instead)
